replies.body:
As others said this is just the Italian Board, try writing to Support if you had a bad experience with some players and recorded some kind of evidence or if you noted any suspicious activity.
I removed any link or image to the player's profile because we don't approve Name&Shame.

Il name & shame non Ã¨ consentito, in caso reportalo al supporto giocatori https://support.riotgames.com/hc/it
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

These are the Italian boards: exposing names is forbidden and anyhow we can't do a thing about it. I suggest you to contact Player Support in your native tongue (that is, Portuguese) in order to get that player punished for intentional feeding.
